alert.note: Alert for Marion; Schley; Sumter; Webster (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 5:46PM EDT until August 12 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Marion County in west central Georgia... Northeastern Webster County in west central Georgia... Schley County in west central Georgia... Northwestern Sumter County in west central Georgia... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 546 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Buena Vista, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Buena Vista, Ellaville, Putnam, Murrays Crossroads, Friendship, Tazewell, Doyle, Church Hill, Draneville, Zellobee, and Walls Crossing. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
